commands.default: print("Gunakan: base64 [en|de]")\nprint("  en: Encode ke Base64")\nprint("  de: Decode dari Base64")
commands.en:
import base64
try:
    text = input("Teks untuk di-encode: ")
    encoded = base64.b64encode(text.encode('utf-8')).decode('utf-8')
    print(f"Hasil: {encoded}")
except Exception as e:
    print(f"Error: {e}")
commands.de:
import base64
try:
    text = input("Teks untuk di-decode: ")
    decoded = base64.b64decode(text.encode('utf-8')).decode('utf-8')
    print(f"Hasil: {decoded}")
except Exception as e:
    print(f"Error: {e}")
